member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA_DOCUMENT
member.summary: Specifies the individual documents that make up the service metadata.

member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA_DOCUMENT.content
member.summary: A * representing the specific XML Schema, WSDL or a Policy document. The service model expects this to be valid for the lifetime of the WS_SERVICE_HOST.

summary.para: The name of the document which will be suffixed to the URL path on which this document is serviced for HTTP GET support for metadata retrieval. Note that this can be set to NULL if the application is only using Ws-MetadataExchange 1.1 for servicing metadata request.
See service endpoint property to see how to enable HTTP GET support or WS-MetadataExchange 1.1 for servicing metadata request.
